qas.question: Under who did Areminia become fully sovereign?
What Empire did the Orontid Dynasty belong to?
When did Armenia reach it's peak?
Which ruler is responsible for Armenias prosperity?

context: During the late 6th century BC, the first geographical entity that was called Armenia by neighboring populations was established under the Orontid Dynasty within the <a1_0>Achaemenid Empire<a1_0/>, as part of the latters' territories. The kingdom became fully sovereign from the sphere of influence of the Seleucid Empire in 190 BC under <a0_0>King Artaxias I<a0_0/> and begun the rule of the Artaxiad dynasty. Armenia reached its height <a2_0>between 95 and 66 BC<a2_0/> under <a3_0>Tigranes the Great<a3_0/>, becoming the most powerful kingdom of its time east of the Roman Republic.
